Solution.analysis: The HTML document is missing a <title> tag, which is important for SEO and accessibility.  code : <title>Your Hotel Name</title>

Fix.analysis: The proposed fix adds the missing `<title>` tag within the `<head>` section, which directly addresses the detected error. This is a standard HTML practice and does not introduce any risk of breaking existing functionality.

Deploy.analysis: Push from the respective fix page.
